title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.8 - Watercraft, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.8 - Watercraft, definition of

State Regulations

All vessels, ships, boats, barges, floating structures or
other devices which are or may be used for the carriage, transportation or
handling of persons or property on or by water. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
